From the rise of Gen AI to the critical questions of leadership and key factors for starting AI projects, Infor CMO Kirsten Allegri Williams offers insightful perspectives on the roles of CIOs and other C-level executives in driving AI initiatives. Kirsten also shares valuable recommendations for organizations and SMEs looking to invest in AI. Dive into this enlightening interview for a comprehensive guide on navigating AI adoption in your business! https://bit.ly/3YdWZ3X #AI #Leadership #DigitalTransformation #AIProjects #Innovation

Watch the replay of our latest webinar with Government Technology, featuring key insights by Prentice Mannetter (Infor), Ja'Tia Thompson (City of Greensboro) and Jesse Dalton (Amazon Web Services (AWS)) on the complexities of ERP migration. This session, moderated by Russ Nichols, Senior Fellow at the Center for Digital Government, highlights key learnings from Greensboro‚Äôs ERP system migration, including: ‚Ä¢ Navigating unexpected disruptions like the COVID-19 pandemic and staff turnovers ‚Ä¢ Achieving a successful migration with limited resources ‚Ä¢ Enhancing the efficiency and effectiveness of their workforce #ERP #GovTech #ERPmigration

Think you know everything about HCM solutions? ‚ú® Think again. No wonder Infor is a leader in the Nucleus Research 2024 HCM Technology Value Matrix. Check it out here: https://bit.ly/3YfJocl #HCM #CloudSuite #TechnologyValueMatrix
